title: Pol Dokhtar Structural Phenomena in Khorram Abad Road
content: From Pol Dokhtar to Khorram Abad in Lorestan province, lots of magnificent structural phenomena can be seen. This road has cut a part of the Zagros mountain range, leaving bare its beautiful outcrops. The internal structure of the anticlines cut through by this road is so spectacular and recognizable. One of the most spectacular sights along this road is the eroded flanks of the anticlines, which due to the existence of soft and hard layers, have created spectacular landscapes.

ST18-3 : The erosion in anticline limb
